```{r}

 npages <-  6

pb <- progress_bar$new(
  format = "  downloading [:bar] :percent in :elapsed ",
  total = npages, clear = FALSE, width= 60)

titles <- c()
dates <- c()
links <- c()

url_template <- "https://www.ukrinform.ua/rubric-polytics/block-lastnews?page="

```



```{r}
for (page in 1:npages) {
  
  url <- str_c(url_template,
               page )
  
  content <- read_html(url) %>%
    html_node("section.restList")    # елемент, де всі потрібні дані
  
  titles <- content %>%
    html_nodes("article h2") %>%
    html_text() %>%
    str_trim() %>%
    c(titles, .)
  
  dates <- content %>%
    html_nodes("article time") %>%
    html_attr("datetime") %>%
    str_trim() %>%
    c(dates, .)
    
  links <- content %>%
    html_nodes("article h2 a") %>%
    html_attr("href") %>%
    c(links, .)

  Sys.sleep(3)  
  
  pb$tick()
}
```


```{r}
data.frame(title = titles,
           date = dates,
           link = links) %>%
  write.csv("ukrinform.csv",
            row.names = FALSE) 
```
